name: Fallen World
description: When magic is lost, ash and despair reign in its stead. When the knights of that cursed order fall, what will rise in their place?

skinlines.name: Ashen Knights
skinlines.description: Many ages long past, a great king waged a glorious war: to break the shackles of magic on the world, so that mankind could forge its own destiny. Yet upon severing the final font of enchantment, the king was lost, the foundations of the world crumbled, and his once-legendary knights were left alone to madness, ruin, and ash.
